commands.name: az repos pr reviewer add
commands.summary: Add one or more reviewers to a pull request.
commands.syntax:
az repos pr reviewer add --id
                         --reviewers
                         [--detect {false, true}]
                         [--org]
                         [--required {false, true}]

commands.name: az repos pr reviewer list
commands.summary: List reviewers of a pull request.
commands.syntax:
az repos pr reviewer list --id
                          [--detect {false, true}]
                          [--org]

commands.name: az repos pr reviewer remove
commands.summary: Remove one or more reviewers from a pull request.
commands.syntax:
az repos pr reviewer remove --id
                            --reviewers
                            [--detect {false, true}]
                            [--org]
